doctor.name: Dr. Md. Mizanur Rahman (Shibli)
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Mizanur Rahman (Shibli) is a Pediatric Surgeon in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), BCS (Health), MS (Pediatric Surgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Pediatric Surgery at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Mizanur Rahman (Shibli) at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 4pm to 8pm (Sat, Sun & Monday).

chamber.address: House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura
